about.title: About me
about.description:
Hi! My name is João Vitor, I am 18 years old. I am currently studying Systems Analysis and Development at FIAP and I’ve been working for almost 1 year as a Software Developer at MRM McCann Worldgroup, a global agency specialized in innovation and digital solutions.

I have an advanced level of English, certified by Wizard by Pearson, which allows me to confidently collaborate on international projects.

My experience includes full stack development, where I actively contribute to all stages of the project — from designing intuitive front-end interfaces to implementing business logic on the back-end. I'm always looking to improve my skills and stay updated with the latest technologies and best practices.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.description: Discover my skills and experiences in technology, where I share ideas and solutions:
technologies.typescript: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing. Ideal for large projects where safety and code clarity are essential. Increases productivity and reduces bugs in React/Node applications.
technologies.javascript: Essential language of the web. Used on the front-end with frameworks like React, and also on the back-end with Node.js. Flexible, asynchronous, and indispensable for interactive applications.
technologies.react: JavaScript library for building interactive interfaces. Works with reusable components, hooks, and state. Very popular in the market for its modularity and performance.
technologies.next: React framework that adds server-side rendering (SSR), static site generation (SSG), automatic routing, and performance optimizations. Widely used for SEO and modern applications..
technologies.tailwind: Utility-first framework that lets you style HTML directly with classes. Highly productive, focusing on responsiveness, performance, and customization. Avoids unnecessary CSS.
technologies.node: Allows JavaScript to run on the back-end. Used to build APIs, automations, web servers, and real-time applications with WebSockets. Has a huge ecosystem via NPM.
technologies.java: Strong in object-oriented programming. Widely used in enterprise systems, Android development, and back-end. Excellent for performance, security, and code structure.
technologies.python: Extremely versatile. Used in automations, back-end with frameworks like Django/Flask, and especially in data science, AI, and quick scripting. Simple and readable syntax.
technologies.sql: Query language for relational databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, and SQL Server. Essential for CRUDs, data analysis, joins, and efficient table modeling.
technologies.aws: Amazon’s cloud computing platform. Used to host APIs, databases, store files, and scale systems. Tools like EC2, S3, and Lambda are common in modern projects.
technologies.azure: Microsoft’s cloud platform. Offers solutions for web apps, databases, CI/CD, and more. Widely used in enterprise environments and integrates well with the Microsoft ecosystem.
technologies.strapi: Strapi is an open-source headless CMS that enables quick and flexible API creation. Allows you to customize content, manage data, and integrate with any frontend.
